scripts.start: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.web node env-config.js && react-scripts start
scripts.electron: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.electron node env-config.js && cross-env ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run build && tsc --project tsconfig.electron.json && electron ./dist/electron.js
scripts.electron-dev: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.electron concurrently "npm:start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc --project tsconfig.electron.json && electron ./dist/electron.js"
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && tsc --project tsconfig.electron.json && electron ./dist/electron.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && tsc --project tsconfig.electron.json && electron-builder
